title: Neurogabin M 100MG Cap 1x10 (L)
details: Gabapentin is used with other medications to prevent and control seizures and relieve nerve pain.
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history, especially of Kidney disease, Mental/Mood problems (such as Depression, Thoughts of suicide), Use/Abuse of drugs/alcohol, Breathing problems (such as COPD). During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed.
effects: Drowsiness, Dizziness, Loss of coordination, Tiredness, Blurred/Double vision, Unusual eye movements, or Shaking (tremor) may occur.

title: Neugalin 25MG Cap 2x7 (L)
details: It is used to treat pain caused by Nerve damage due to Diabetes or Shingles (herpes zoster) infection.
precautions: Tell your doctor or pharmacist your medical history of, Heart failure, Kidney disease, History of an Allergic reaction which included itching/swelling of the face/lips/tongue/throat (Angioedema), Personal or family history of a substance use disorder (such as Overuse of or addiction to drugs/alcohol), breathing problems (such as COPD). During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed. This drug passes into breast milk. Consult your doctor before breast-feeding.
effects: Drowsiness, Dizziness, Headache, Dry mouth, Nausea, Constipation, and Weight gain may occur.

title: Baliptic 75MG Cap 2x7 (L)
details: It is an anticonvulsant drug used for the treatment of neuropathic pain (neuropathy), musculoskeletal pain (fibromyalgia), and epilepsy (fits).
precautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Protect from direct exposure to sunlight, and heat. Store below the room temperature.
effects: In some cases, it may cause mild to moderate adverse reactions. In the case of side effects, discontinue the use and try to find a doctor. Major Side effects may include, skin irritations, itching, rashes, redness, and swelling on the skin. Others may include digestive problems , i.e. bloating, gas, diarrhea, constipation, gerd (gastroesophageal reflux disease), nausea, and vomiting, etc. Consult a doctor, if you have hypersensitivity to any of its ingredients.

title: Piractim 120ML Syp
details: It is used for Alzheimers disease, dementia, memory dysfunction, alcoholism, Raynaud's phenomenon, DVT, stroke, tardive dyskinesia, dyslexia, brain injury, vertigo.
precautions: This medicine should be used with caution in patients having an impairment of kidney function. Suitable dose adjustments are advised based on the extent of impairment. It should be used with caution in patients suffering from a disease of the heart of the blood vessels. Any incidence of a clotting disorder should be promptly reported to the doctor.May impair ability to drive or perform hazardous tasks. Some drugs that react with this medicine include clopidogrel, cilostazol. This drug is known to cause issues during pregnancy, therefore please do not take this drug if you are pregnant.
effects: It can cause diarrhea, weight gain, somnolence, insomnia, nervousness, depression, hyperkinesia, rash.
